results.title: Hypoxic-ischemic related cerebrovascular changes and potential therapeutic strategies in the neonatal brain
results.text_hl: However, some studies have reported beneficial effects of @DISEASE_Hypothermia @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@, @GENE_EPO @GENE_2056 @@@erythropoietin@@@, stem cell therapy, anti-cytokine therapy and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in ameliorating several different facets of @<m>DISEASE_Thoracic_Outlet_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013901 @@@damage to the NVU@@@ after @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@-related @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@ in the perinatal period.

citations.NLM: Disdier C, Stonestreet BS. Hypoxic-ischemic related cerebrovascular changes and potential therapeutic strategies in the neonatal brain J Neurosci Res. 2020 Jul;98(7):1468-1484. PMID: 32060970
